Description: Now you have two workers at your command! Divide and conquer by assigning tasks to each. Build faster, build smarter!

Commands.Description: Move worker 1 to the stone pile.
Move worker 2 to the stone pile.
Worker 1 picks up the first stone.
Worker 2 picks up the second stone.
Worker 1 places the stone on the left side.
Worker 2 places the stone on the right side.
